name: It's the Climb.
description: We will be climbing and trekking Mt. Pinatubo, one of the largest and most historic volcanoes in the Philippines. It is known for one of the most massive eruptions back in 1991 and has become a tourist spot ever since. From the start until the end of this trip, you get to see and experience the aftermath of that historical event. So hold on and get ready to be marveled by the view and landscape that awaits you on this trip.
